room_title: Escape room "The Diamond Mine" by Amazing Escape Room in New York
review: We did the Diamond Mine with a group of ten and it was a fantastic experience. All of us had a great time. Our mining guide James was a true professional. Will definitely come back for other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Diamond Mine" by Amazing Escape Room in New York
review: Had so much fun doing the Diamond Mine! We were able to finish just in time with a little help from our game master.

room_title: Escape room "The Diamond Mine" by Amazing Escape Room in New York
review: A bunch of us, family and friends. We all thought it was amazing. It was complex but not unbeatable. Fun throughout! The room and it puzzles got all 10 of us involved and the 60 minutes timer run down alarmingly fast..Me did manage to escape the room with 1 minute 47 seconds to spare.. It was mad fun! We will trying different rooms in the future.All in all, a great experience.

room_title: Escape room "The Diamond Mine" by Amazing Escape Room in New York
review: Some of us from work decided to do this for fun and a team building exercise. It couldn't have gone any better!! The woman who greeted us and got us signed in was super friendly and gave us some insight on what we could expect. The other woman who gave us our clues was absolutely amazing also and only helped when we actually needed it. This was such an amazing experience and we will definitely be doing it again!! I suggest for everyone to at least try this!!
